app.title: WeiLend

buttons.payInstallment: Pay an installment of your Loan

headers.big: Bring your creative project to life
headers.small: Next generation p2p lending is here.
headers.dontForget: Dont Forget to Add Your Campaign Image

app.copyright: Copyright Â© WeiLend 2015. All Rights Reserved

text.about_1: A Better Way To Lend p2p
text.about_2: WeiLend is a free to use, totally open-source crowdfunding platform built on Ethereum.
text.about_4: WeiLend is proudly build with Ethereum, a decentralized open-source consensus ecosystem that enables a more free and secure internet.
text.about_6: Our philosophy is simple: clean design, totally decentralized, 100% open-sourced, minimalist, no fee, light, and reactive.
text.start_1: Fill out your project details below and get your cheap loan to fund your project!
text.start_2: Upload a 500px by 300px PNG image titled 'weilend.png' (without the qoutes) to your website's main directory.
text.start_3: **Note, this is the image that will be used on WeiLend.
text.details_1: All funds are in Ether denominations
text.details_2: If your funding goal is not reached by the alloted time period, all ether is returned to the respective doners
text.details_3: If your funding goal is reached, the funds will be available to the beneficiary address provided
text.details_4: You can easily repay your installments and they will be distributed automatically among your lenders
text.details_5: Please provide a website url and operation name below 32 characters
text.details_6: A loan ID will be provided after the funding is started, use this to promote your loan application

text.failed: Ah, snap... This loan has expired and could not raise enough funds.
text.success: This loan has reached it's goal!
text.payoutProcessed: This loan has been payedout, whoohoo!
text.donationProcessed: Your contribution has been processed, thankyou!
